column2: There’s something about the Federation’s promises that feels off... I sense they’re not telling us the whole story.
Still, I have to appear cooperative. I don’t want to be branded a derelict.
Are those monsters the Federation’s doing?
I knew they weren’t telling us the whole story...
I’m still curious as to what the Federation was hoping to accomplish with those machines.
At any rate, if they’re gone now, I can only assume the Federation’s plans must be in pieces.
